long_description: This bottle lets you remain in the aerodynamic position and keep yourself hydrated without losing valuable time. Bottle features an extended straw and mesh plug for on-the-go re-filling. Perfect fit on Profile Airstryke and Century aerobars. Aerodrink(R) Bracket Adapter (sold separately) is required for all other applications. Polyethylene is 100% BPA free.
short_description: This bottle lets you remain in the aerodynamic position and keep yourself hydrated without losing valuable time.
